public class RemoveLabelTask
extends PublicationTask

Ant task to insert a label into an existing node in a tree.

Author:
egli

removeLabel

public void removeLabel(java.lang.String documentid,
                        java.lang.String labelName,
                        java.lang.String language,
                        java.lang.String area)
                 throws SiteTreeException
Remove a label in an existing node in the tree. If this happens to be the last label it is not removed.

Parameters:
documentid - the document-id of the document.
labelName - the name of the label that is to be inserted.
language - the language of the label that is to be inserted.
area - determines in which sitetree the label is to be inserted
Throws:
SiteTreeException - if an error occurs.
